channel.title: Crowns next to names
channel.description:
alright, i was trying to add the admin crowns next to the names in the moonspell client. ive got #adm# working and ive added [code] if (status == 3) message = "#adm#" + message;[/code] after compiling and logging in, nothing works.
im sure its something reallllyyyy simple, like always, i seem to forget most of the simple things lmao.
EDIT: nvm i got it working, moonspell has weird ranks O.o it was obvious btw..
